alert.note: Alert for Rutherford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RUTHERFORD COUNTY... At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Christiana, or 7 miles southeast of Murfreesboro, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 555 PM CDT, social media photos showed quarter size hail in Christiana with this storm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro and Christiana. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 82 and 91. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
